items.name: Burgeritos

items.name: Chicano
items.description: Quarter-pounder burger with fresh homemade salsa, creamy cheese sause, lettuce, mayonnaise and the taste of mexico. Viva la burger! Served with potato chips.

items.name: Kamikazee
items.description: Quarte-pounder burger with our creamy cheese sauce, mayonnaise and lettuce, smoothered with wasabi sauce ... making this exotice burger historically significant. It's TO-DIE-FOR! Served with potata chips

items.name: Real Blue Cheese Burger
items.description: Quarter-pounder burger garnished with lettuce, coated with mayonnaise and toppped with blue cheese spread that will make your tongue tinggle. Served with potato chips.

items.name: Crispy Burger Melt
items.description: The hotshots best seller! Quarter-pounder burger generously toppped with sliced mushroom, crispy bacon bits, creamy cheese sauce and mayonnaise. THe unique flavor and texture is sure to deilght your plate. Served with potato chips.

items.name: Ultimate Burger
items.description: Double quarter-pounder burger garnished with onions, lettuce, tomatoes and mayyonaise, a mighty burger for those with tremendously big appetite. Served with potato chips.

items.name: Mozarella Burger
items.description: Double quarter-puner burger garnished with onions, lettuce, tomatoes, mayonnaise and mozarella cheese. Served with potato chips.

items.name: Bigshot Burger
items.description: A mighty for those with tremendously big appetites! Comes with 300g pure beef patty, bacon, cucumber, onions, tomato, lettuce, mayo, cheese sauce an mozarella cheese. Served with french fries.
